decision_conditions: It is hereby certified that the operations described in the 'Description of development' hereto in respect of the land specified in the 'Location of development' hereto and edged in red on the Location Plan (drawing number 1158_EXS01_I1) attached to this certificate, would have been lawful within the meaning of Section 191 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended), for the following reason:

The works carried out at the application site prior to 4th April 2014 commenced the development authorised by planning permission 65680/APP/2011/36, such that this permission remains extant. Completion of the authorised development in accordance with the terms and conditions of planning permission 65680/APP/2011/36, would therefore be covered by an express grant of planning permission and so would be lawful.
description: Application to confirm commencement of development prior to expiry date pursuant to Condition 1 of planning permission ref: 65680/APP/2011/36 dated 4th April 2011 (Erection of 4 two-bedroom back to back two storey dwellings with associated parking and amenity space and installation of new vehicular crossover, involving demolition of existing detached dwelling) (Application for Certificate of Lawfulness for an Existing Operation)
